author: @fox35news
text: [Trump's proposed tariffs could drive up food prices, experts say](/news/trumps-proposed-tariffs-could-drive-up-food-prices-experts-say) A critical concern among economists is that President-elect Donald Trump's proposed blanket tariffs on imports would drive up food prices. [Buyer beware: 5 tricks online retailers use to get you to buy more](/news/tricks-online-retailers-use-get-you-buy-more) Online shoppers should pay attention to common tactics retailers and advertisers use to get you to buy more. [Food recalls ahead of Thanksgiving: 3 you should know about](/news/food-recalls-thanksgiving-2024-3-you-should-know-about) The FDA and USDA announced three recent recalls on food items that have been potentially contaminated with E. coli and listeria as Thanksgiving approaches. [Forget about shopping on Black Friday: This retailer wants you to go outside](/news/forget-shopping-black-friday-retailer-wants-go-outside) This company is shutting down its nearly 200 retail locations, distribution centers and website on Black Friday. [Here's what the housing market will look like in 2025](/news/housing-market-2025-will-look-like) Mortgage rates will play a big role in shaping next year's housing market, according to a new report. [Tortilla strips in 22 states recalled over undeclared allergen: FDA](/news/fresh-gourmet-tortilla-strips-recall-22-undeclared-allergen-fda) Fresh Gourmet Tortilla Strips Santa Fe Style have been recalled for an undeclared allergen in the package. Here's what to know. [Ground beef recalled after 19 sickened in Minnesota](/news/minnesota-e-coli-outbreak-beef-recall) At least 19 Minnesotans fell ill from E. coli linked to a national recall of over 167,000 pounds of ground beef. Restaurants across Minnesota were affected, and four cases required hospitalization. [Walmart warns of higher prices if Trump implements proposed tariffs](/news/walmart-higher-prices-trump-proposed-tariffs) The National Retail Federation projected that potential tariffs could cost American consumers between $46 billion and $78 billion in annual spending power. [Hyundai, Kia recall over 208,000 EVs; could suffer loss of power](/news/hyundai-kia-recall-evs-loss-power) The recalls cover Hyundai and Genesis vehicles including the 2022 through 2024 Ioniq 5, the 2023 through 2025 Ioniq 6, GV60 and GV70, and the 2023 and 2024 G80. [41% of Black Friday items offer no savings, report finds -- here are the best and worst product categories](/news/black-friday-best-worst-product-categories) After Thanksgiving, shoppers will flood stores looking for the best deals available, but a new survey takes a closer look at if these bargains really offer you the most for your money. [Ground beef recalled due to possible E. Coli contamination](/news/ground-beef-recalled-due-possible-e-coli-contamination) More than 165,000 pounds of ground beef products that were shipped nationwide have been recalled due to possible E. Coli contamination. [McDonald's announces 'McValue' offering in 2025: Here's what it will include](/news/mcdonalds-mcvalue-offering-2025-heres-what-will-include) McDonald’s will have a new “McValue" offering starting on Jan. 7, 2025, at U.S. restaurants. Here's what it will include. [BJ's Wholesale to hike membership fees for first time in 7 years](/news/bjs-wholesale-hike-membership-fees-2025) The cost of a BJ’s Wholesale Club membership will get pricier in January, when the company plans to raise its standard and Club+ memberships. [Nearly 3 in 4 Americans fear Social Security won't be available when they retire, poll finds](/news/social-security-retirement-fears) A new survey reveals widespread concerns among Americans about the future of Social Security benefits as the program faces potential funding shortfalls. [Another cinnamon brand recalled over 'elevated levels' of lead](/news/cinnamon-recall-lead-levels-november-2024) Another brand of cinnamon has been voluntarily recalled. It’s at least the fourth FDA-issued alert linked to lead levels in cinnamon since March. [Competition for homes is easing the fastest for buyers in these markets](/news/buyers-market-november-2024-what-regions) New construction and recovering U.S. inventory are helping to tilt more markets in favor of buyers in the South, as well as a few other areas, according to Zillow. [Is Reddit down? Outage reported by social media users](/news/reddit-down-outage-reported-social-media-users) There was a spike of more than 46,000 error reports Wednesday afternoon for Reddit, according to Downdetector.
